trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout"></xref> event.
This class cannot be inherited.
Changes to a control such as resizing, showing or hiding child controls, and adding or removing child controls make it necessary for a control to layout its child controls.
A LayoutEventArgs specifies the child control that has been changed and its affected property.
For example, if a control has been made visible since the last layout operation, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> property is affected.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedControl%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedProperty%2A> properties are set to `null` if no values were provided when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PerformLayout%2A> method was called.
For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified component and property affected.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> affected by the layout change.
The property affected by the layout change.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified control and property affected.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> affected by the layout change.
The property affected by the layout change.
Gets the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> affected by the layout change.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> representing the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> affected by the layout change.
Gets the child control affected by the change.
The AffectedControl property is set to `null` if no value was provided when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PerformLayout%2A> method was called.
The child <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> affected by the change.
Gets the property affected by the change.
If a child control has been made visible since the last layout operation, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> property is affected.
The AffectedProperty property is set to `null` if no value was provided when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PerformLayout%2A> method was called.
The property affected by the change.
